message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to let it go for $17,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand your enthusiasm for the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle? I'm willing to drop to $14,000.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $13,000 for the product. I hope this helps move us closer to a mutually agreeable solution.
